text: David John Spofforth (born 21 March 1969) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Poppleton, York Railway Institute, Nestlé Rowntree and Selby Town. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from York Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:York City F.C. players Category:York Railway Institute A.F.C. players Category:Nestlé Rowntree F.C. players Category:Selby Town F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: David Spofforth
